threads: The real healthcare crisis isn't the cost, it's the government interference. Free market solutions, not price controls or single-payer systems, will bring affordability and quality care to all.
text: Ah, the days when a man could afford good care with honest work! Government meddling in healthcare only muddles the waters. Traditional markets, free from overreach, naturally ensure quality and accessibility. We must return to the principles that built this nation.
